thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Michael Dolan
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Michael Dolan

author: Michael Dolan
title: Michael Dolan
text: I placed my order online last Friday evening and received delivery on the following Monday afternoon. I received a phone call from Courier who was very pleasant and met him Enroute to my jouse to collect delivery as this also saved him some time in his day. Very pleased with the overall service.
